attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Local residents demand action against the crime on our doorsteps - BURGLARIES, DRUG DEALING, MUGGING, VIOLENCE & DAMAGE TO OUR PROPERTY

1. LOCAL COUNCILLORS (Lib Dems) AND THE LOCAL POLICE are not listening or responding to our problems.

THEY TELL US CRIME IS DECREASING and they are increasing resources AND IT'S ALL IN CONTROL

THAT IS NOT OUR EVERY DAY EXPERIENCE - WE ARE  NOW EXPERIENCING MORE CRIME THAN EVER BEFORE.

WE WANT ACTION - WE WANT CCTV IN ESTABLISHED TROUBLE SPOTS - WE WANT MORE POLICING

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
